services.name: Basic Facial
services.description: Facial cleansing, skin analysis, steam, exfoliation, extractions (as needed), mask, moisturizer, and sunscreen.

services.name: Full Facial
services.description: Includes high frequency, LED light therapy, serum, and massage.

services.name: Deluxe Facial
services.description: Includes microdermabrasion and a hydrojelly mask.

services.name: Dermaplaning
services.description: Minimally invasive procedure that removes top layers of skin for smoother texture and improved appearance.

services.name: Dermaplaning + Facial
services.description: Combines dermaplaning with all features of a full facial.

services.name: Rejuvenating Facial (IPL)
services.description: Includes IPL laser to target various skin concerns.

services.name: HydroDermabrasion Facial
services.description: Fluid dermabrasion combined with LED therapy and a nourishing mask.

services.name: Acne Treatment Facial
services.description: Targets acne-prone skin with extractions and IPL laser treatment.

services.name: Gua Sha Facial
services.description: Includes gua sha massage, LED therapy, hand massage, and more.

services.name: Couple's Facial
services.description: A full facial treatment for two guests.

services.name: HydroJelly Mask Add-On
services.description: Optional enhancement to any facial.

services.name: Microdermabrasion Add-On
services.description: Optional microdermabrasion treatment enhancement.
